alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 9:13AM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Key West through 945 AM EDT... At 912 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sunset Key, or 7 miles southwest of Key West, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Key West, Fleming Key, Sunset Key and Key Haven. This includes US 1 between mile markers 0 and 4. This includes US 1 between mile markers 0 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
